casebody.data:
Monday, June 20, 1994

MOTION DOCKET

92-1276. Arpadi v. First MSP Corp.

Cuyahoga County, No. 59939. On June 13, 1994, appellees filed a reply memorandum relating to appellees’ earlier-filed motion for reconsideration. There being no provision in the Supreme Court Rules of Practice permitting the filing of reply memoranda in support of motions,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, effective June 15, 1994, that appellees’ reply memorandum be, and is hereby, stricken.

F.E. Sweeney, J., not participating.
